title: Chennai International Airport
summary: Chennai International Airport (IATA: MAA, ICAO: VOMM) is an international airport serving the city of Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India, and its metropolitan area. It is located in Tirusulam, 21 km (13 mi) from the city centre.  Chennai International Airport is the  sixth busiest airport in India[4] It was also 49th busiest airport in Asia in 2018 making it one of the four major airports in India under the top 50 list of 2018.[5] In financial year 2021, the airport handled 5.49 million passengers.[6]
